flawed_nl_solution:
He increases the length to 13+2=<<13+2=15>>15 feet
He increases the width to 18+2=<<18+2=20>>20 feet
So the rooms are 15*20=<<15*20=30>>30 square feet
So he has 1+3=<<1+3=4>>4 rooms of this size
So he has 4*30=<<4*30=120>>120 square feet of rooms this size
He also has one room of size 30*2=<<30*2=60>>60 square feet
So he has 120+60=<<120+60=180>>180 square feet of rooms
#### 180

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 30. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
